tech surf.description: An inclined ramp where a player must run nearly parallel and jump with minimal mouse movement

crouched headbanger.description: When a player has to jump out from inside a cubby from a crouched position

wallstrafe.description: Gaining speed by holding a or d against the wall while moving parallel to it

headbanger.description: When a player has to strafe out and duck at the right time to clear a low ceiling or obstacle

boxtech.description: When a player has to make abrupt 90 degree turns in the air

gap jump.description: When a player has to jump through a small gap that's only slightly wider than the player model

bhop to tech surf.description: Ride up a technical surf ramp while bhopping

180 tech surf.description: An inclined ramp where the destination block is directly opposing it

dropdown.description: Strafe around obstacles or into small openings while falling

drop.description: Jump from a higher platform to a much lower one, often strafe heavy

weirdjump.description: Map forces a player to bhop after falling from a higher surface without jumping off first

strafeheavy.description: Map contains long distances that require good strafes to clear

ladder headbanger.description: Player must launch from a ladder and crouch at the right time to clear a lower ceiling

timed ladder.description: A player can only remain on the ladder for a fixed amount of time. No checkpoints allowed

cubby ladder.description: Player must ladder strafe out of a very constrained space with protruding sides

180 ladder.description: A ladder where the destination block is directly behind the player facing the ladder

ladder around pillar.description: Two ladders on opposite sides of a pillar or wall

gap ladder.description: Two ladders oriented vertically with a gap inbetween that the player must strafe out and back in to reach.

blocked ladder.description: Two ladders oriented vertically with a block inbetween that the player must strafe out and back in to reach.

angled surf.description: A single surf ramp with 90 degree corners

resurf.description: Surfing a ramp more than once to gain speed

water surf.description: When a player holds jump and strafes on the water surface to gain speed

slide.description: A 1.6 game mode that contained smaller ramps and very technical surfs

height surf.description: A small surf ramp that the player must use to get to a higher block

corner surf.description: A Player must surf around a 90 degree corner on to another surf

gap surf.description: Multiple surf ramps separated by gaps that the player must strafe out of and back in to clear

pixel surf.description: Holding a or d against the wall while running parallel to it

surf reuse.description: Player needs to surf on a previous surf framp but from a higher platform to gain more height

kurouch.description: A bhop technique where you crouch bhop and turn around when you don't hit a perf

crouch bhop.description: A player must manually crouch jump to a higher bhop block and immediately continue bhopping

bhop.description: Player must use the scroll wheel to jump

small bhop.description: Player must bhop on very small blocks

headbanger bhop.description: Player must crouch while bhopping and cannot gain speed unless they hit a crouch perf

forced perf.description: Map contains distances that are nearly impossible to reach with 275 prespeed

cubby bhop.description: A player must bhop in and out of multiple constrained spaces

bhop crouch.description: A player must crouch before the peak of his jump to clear an obstacle or to reduce height

booster.description: Blocks that provide a huge upward momentum

wall booster.description: Blocks that provide a huge upward momentum

small block.description: Player must strafe out from a small block and gain as much prespeed as possible

prekeep.description: When a player lands and quickly jumps again before friction has fully reset the prespeed

crouchjump.description: When a player manually crouches and jumps in quick succession to gain extra height

climb.description: Easy map with a lot of climb

combo.description: Easy maps with good flow. Most blocks can be bhop.

ladder-surf-bhop chain.description: A series of consecutive ladders, surfs, and bhops without any blocks to land on in between

surf-bhop chain.description: A series of consecutive surfs and bhops without any blocks to land on in between

ladder-bhop chain.description: A series of consecutive ladders and bhops without any blocks to land on in between

ladder-surf chain.description: A series of consecutive ladders and surfs without any blocks to land on in between

ladder chain.description: A series of consecutive ladders without any blocks to land on in between

dropdown-bhop chain.description: A bhop section immediately following a dropdown

keys.description: Map where a player needs to obtain an item to move on to the next level.

nonlinear.description: A map that contains multiple routes or objectives that can be finished in any order

pro checkpoint zones.description: Map contains special zones a player must move into to set a pro checkpoint

porn room.description: Map containing NSFW room, usually hidden away

timer tech skip.description: Map contains a timer that can be reached from an unintended location
